Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (48.42%) toAntiviral lectin scytovirin (SVN)G: 15%, A: 13%, S: 13%.Chemical modification: two S-S bonds.Activity: inhibited HIV-1 (EC50 182 nM).MOA:virus:  SD2 appears to bind gp120 (57%) and gp41 (44%) of intact SVN.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: pET32c(+) vector, fused with thioredoxin, His-tag, enterokinase digestion. Yield: 1.7 mg/L.

Literature Information.Title: Potent anti-HIV activity of scytovirin domain 1 peptide.
